name: wink-statistics
description: Implementation of Porter Stemmer Algorithm V2 by Dr Martin F Porter

scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run hint && npm run readmedocs
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.readmedocs: documentation readme src/probability*.js --section=probability && documentation readme src/streaming*.js --section=streaming

author: Sanjaya Kumar Saxena
